metadata.dc:author: Sinues Ojas, Bryan A
Herranz Fernández, Luis Miguel
Garrido Abad, Pablo
Fernández Arjona, Manuel
metadata.dc:description: A 45 year old male was referred to our clinic after an episode of acute prostatitis six weeks before, treated with ciprofloxacin for one month. Genital examination was normal with prostate slightly painful on DRE.
metadata.dc:title: ABSESCO DE VESÍCULAR SEMINAL TRAS PROSTATITIS AGUDA.
[Seminal vesicle abscess after acute prostatitis].
